<!--- DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. IT IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED. -->


Computes the sine of a number (in radians).



```
sin(num: number) -> number
```

### Examples

```kcl
const myVar = sin(2 * pi())
```

### Arguments

* `num`: `number` (REQUIRED)

### Returns

`number`
